column3: ɔmansinhen Herod tsee Jesus ne nka
column7: John Onumanyi no a: oenyan no efi ewufo mu; dɛm ntsi na tum ndwuma yi da edzi wɔ no mu yi."

column2: "Ansaana no nna Herod no nua Filip ne yer Herodias ntsi
column3: Herod akyer John akyekyer no akɔto efiadze."

column2: "Ne siantsir nye dɛ John see no dɛ
column3: Innyi ho kwan dɛ ewar basia no."

column2: "Ɔpɛɛ dɛ nkyɛ oku no naaso osuroo ɔman no

column3: Herodias ne babaa bae bɛsawee wɔ hɔn enyim

column2: "Ɔno do na ɔdze ntam bɔɔ no anohoba dɛ ɔbɛma no biribiara a obebisa."
"Na ne na kaa hyɛɛ ne ntsirmu no
column4: Fa John Onumanyi no ne tsir to prɛtse mu ma me ha."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ ɔhen no yaw; naaso ne ntam nye hɔn a wɔnye no tse edzidzi no ntsi
"na ɔsomae ma wokotwaa John ne tsir wɔ efiadze."
"Na wɔdze ne tsir too prɛtse mu bae
"Na n’esuafo no bae bɛfaa no fun no kesiei

column3: ɔtwee noho fii hɔ nam hɛn mu kɔr sar do nkyɛn beebi
column5: wofii nkurow mu nam daadze tsiiw no."

column4: na ne yamu hyehyee no maa hɔn

column3: n’esuafo baa ne nkyɛn bɛsee no dɛ
column5: na adze so resa: gya nyimpadodow yi kwan
column6: ma wɔnkɔ nkuraase nkɔtɔ edziban mma hɔnho."

column3: Onnhia dɛ wɔkɔ beebiara: homara hom mma hɔn biribi ma wondzi."
Yɛwɔ paanoo enum nye esunam ebien pɛ wɔ ha."

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ nyimpadodow no dɛ wɔntsenatsena mpɔnkɔfuw no do
column8: na ɔdze paanoo no maa n’esuafo no
column9: na n’esuafo no dze maa nyimpadodow no."

column2: "Na hɔn nyina dzidzii mee; na wɔtasee mporoporoba a ɔkae no

column3: sɛ wɔannkan mbaa nye mbofraba annka ho a

column2: "Na ntsɛmara opiapiaa n’esuafo no dɛ wɔnkɔ hɛn mu na wondzi n’enyim kan wɔ esuegya noho

column3: ɔkɔr koko no do nkyɛn beebi kɔsɔree; na odur ewimbir no nna noara nko na ɔwɔ hɔ."

column4: na asorɛkye rubu bɔ no; na mframa so esi hɔn enyim."

column3: Bra.  Na Peter fii hɛn no mu sii
